nodes.text: A repulsorlift platoon was a formation in the Imperial Army.

Three repulsorlift squads, one heavy weapons repulsorlift squad, and a command element, comprising fifty-six personnel, formed a repulsorlift platoon. The command element contained two light transport vehicles that had been modified with heavier armor and a greater repulsorlift output. A support vehicle carrying spare parts was also attached to the platoon, and was manned by four crew who doubled as mechanics, and eight technicians.
A repulsorlift platoon could be augmented by the addition of two extra repulsorlift squads, and two extra heavy weapons repulsorlift squads.
